name: Guardian Systems
description:
Guardian systems is a single player game where you control simultaneously two characters through different levels that will test your coordination !

Will you make it to the last level ?

This short game was made by two people during their free time :

  • Ryad Godard - Game designer/Programmer [Portfolio]
  • Nicolas Tham - Game Artist [Portfolio]

The game is free !

You can donate to help us funding the greenlight submission fee to get our best games on steam, if you liked the game (each $ is more than enough for us :) )

My other games :

  • ShadoWalker
  • L'employé parfait
